sourceMeaningMnemonic: If there is a <radical>drum</radical> in your <radical>mouth</radical> it's time to <kanji>rejoice</kanji>! And because of your mouth drum your rejoicing will be loud and booming!
meaningInfo: Imagine having a drum in your mouth and rejoicing about it! Imagine how loud it would be!
readingMnemonic: You loudly <kanji>rejoice</kanji> for a while when suddenly someone runs over and shoves a <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>) in your mouth, locking it shut. You can't rejoice anymore! You need that key to unlock your mouth!
readingInfo: Imagine if people could just stop the rejoicing of others by locking their mouths shut with keys. What a sad world.
